cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.IR. 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG) because it proposes a Bayesian framework for distance metric learning and applies it to active learning. The paper also mentions content-based image retrieval, which suggests that it may also belong to computer vision (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper mentions classification, which is a common task in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper discusses the selection of informative training examples, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR).
